Projects

Toxic Comment Detection using Deep Learning

Description - code

Multilabel comment detection using deep learning and evaluating performance on CNN, LSTM, and a combination of the previous two called C-LSTM. This is my senior project so it’s still ongoing. The project is from the kaggle competition.

YouTube trending analysis

Description - code

Exploratory data analysis of YouTube trending videos.The data is from 11/17/17 to 12/14/17. The goal was to see if we can find interesting properties of YouTube trending videos. I also used a one class support vector machine to try and predict whether a video will trend or not.

Deep learning for facial emotion recognition

Description - code

Exploratory data analysis of YouTube trending videos. The data came with 6 emotions: fear, happy, surprise, angry, disgust, sad, neutral. I used a convolutional neural network to try and detect the emotions. The network only got about 55%. In this case the bottleneck could be data or the network was too small but I don’t have more computational power to make the network bigger.

This project is maintained by AndersonReyes
